summary: THE VEHICLE WAS INVOLVED IN A COLLISION IN WHICH THE PASSENGER SIDE AIR BAGS DEPLOYED UPWARDS.    *NLM    THE CONSUMER SLAMMED ON THE BRAKES AND THEY DID NOT RESPOND.  THE VEHICLE WAS TOTALED AND THE ENTIRE FRONT END WAS PUSHED IN.  THE DRIVER SIDE AIR BAGS DEPLOYED BUT THE PASSENGER SIDE DID NOT, INSTEAD IT JUST BLEW IN THE CONSUMER'S WIFE'S FACE.  (IN WHICH SHE SUFFERED INJURIES)  THE BRAKES HAD TO BE CLEANED OF GREASE WHEN THE CONSUMER FIRST TOOK OWNERSHIP OF THE VEHICLE AND A FEW WEEKS LATER THE MASTER CYLINDER HAD TO BE REPLACED.   *SCC   *JB
